comment.body: Welcome to zeronet :-) Hope you are doing fine. Erkan http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroBlog.bit
ZeroNet, taking you to/over your boundaries :-)

@neat did something go wrong on your site? I am seeing since 20-30 mins in my blog feed some html tags from you, like: (1). Or is this on purpose?  (1) <marquee width=' 200px'>Oh, neat. The nerd blog.</marquee>

Feel free to report bugs/ideas for the blog at (1). And, I am sure the NSA and other state's agencies are indexing already. Also, they index the versions changed from each site. :-( (1) https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroBlog/issues
not at all ;-) and, I just made YOU look
pic on left: who is the one holding you in his arms? :-)
